title: I have my phone set to "Use network-provided time zone" & it went to DST when it wasn't supposed to
content:
I'm wondering if this is an Android issue or a cell carrier issue. My phone is and was using the "Use network-provided time zone" option and when I woke up this morning my phone had adjusted for Daylight Savings Time; however I'm in Arizona and we don't participate.

When I went to look and see how to fix it, the screen did say "Mountain Standard Time +06:00" which is the correct time zone without daylight savings (although it would say +07:00)I Restarting my phone seems to have fixed it for now, but I'm still interested to see who might be the cause of this.
